name: Russian Solitaire HD
description:
Russian Solitaire is less known but very involving solitaire similar to Yukon. When playing 2 or 4 suits use undo to win!

Features:
- high resolutions for tablets and larger phones,
- clean cards,
- undo,
- saving state,
- 1 suit (easy), 2 suit (hard, use undo!), 4 suit (very hard, a real challenge)

Rules
- You can move any group of not reversed cards,
- You can drop cards when card below has the same suit and is one point higher than the starting card,
- You can put only Kings on empty places

Tips
- Try to release reversed card ASAP,
- Don't move cards to the foundation too soon, they may be needed later

Check our other solitaires!
